item.title: Singtel is celebrating Lunar New Year by offering free unlimited mobile data and previews of Singtel TV
item.description:
Source: Singtel. To celebrate the Year of the Monkey, Singtel is offering special promotions to its customers. For two days, from 12 am on February 7th to 11:59 pm on February 8th, all Singtel postpaid customers will receive free unlimited mobile data. Additionally, Singtel TV customers can access free previews of over 150 channels for a longer period, starting from 12 am on February 5th and ending at 11:59 pm on February 14th...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-is-celebrating-lunar-new-year-by-offering-free-unlimited-mobile-data-and-previews-of-singtel-tv/

item.title: Preview the SG50 National Day promotion at Fairmont Singapore
item.description:
To commemorate Singapore’s 50th anniversary, the Fairmont Singapore is offering a special package. This package provides guests with a prime location to view the fireworks display during the National Day preview parade on August 1st. Ranging from S$400++ to S$750++ for a one-night stay, the package includes a premium room with views of Marina Bay and the Padang. Guests will also enjoy complimentary breakfast for two and a 24-hour self-parking coupon at Raffles City Shopping Centre...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/preview-the-sg50-national-day-promotion-at-fairmont-singapore/
